CTA_SUBTITLE: Your One-Stop Shop for All Things Gaming
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Endless titles, amazing deals, instant access
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does our video game marketplace work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our marketplace connects gamers with sellers offering a wide variety of video games. Browse, compare prices, and purchase digital or physical copies of games securely through our platform.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What types of games are available on the marketplace?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We offer a diverse selection of games across all major platforms, including PC, consoles, and mobile. You'll find new releases, classic titles, indie gems, and everything in between.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Is it safe to buy games on this marketplace?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! We prioritize user safety and employ robust security measures to protect your transactions. Additionally, we verify sellers and offer buyer protection to ensure a trustworthy shopping experience.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I sell my own games on this marketplace?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes! Whether you're an individual looking to sell used games or a developer wanting to distribute your creations, our marketplace provides tools to list and sell your games to a global audience of gamers.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Level Up Your Gaming Experience: Stay Informed!
HERO_SUBTITLE: Buy, sell, and exchange games across all platforms in one convenient place
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our video game marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How do I purchase games on your platform?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: To purchase games, simply create an account, browse our catalog, select the game you want, and proceed to checkout. We offer various payment methods for your convenience.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I sell my own games on your marketplace?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes! We welcome indie developers and publishers. To sell your games, apply for a developer account and follow our submission guidelines to list your titles.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Our marketplace supports games for PC, Mac, Linux, and major consoles. We're constantly expanding our platform support to cater to all gamers.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We offer a 14-day refund policy for most games, provided you've played less than 2 hours. Some exceptions may apply for certain titles or special promotions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! Our dedicated customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any issues or questions you may have about purchases, downloads, or account-related matters.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Your One-Stop Shop for All Things Gaming
FEATURE_1_BODY: Access thousands of titles across multiple platforms, from indie gems to AAA blockbusters.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Get your games immediately with our fast and secure digital delivery system.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Make informed decisions with honest reviews and ratings from fellow gamers.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Enjoy regular sales, discounts, and bundle deals to get the best value for your money.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Connect with friends, join multiplayer sessions, and share your gaming achievements effortlessly.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Get assistance anytime with our dedicated support team, ensuring a smooth gaming experience.
